text: i need to query my table where track='Data Pipelines & Systems' how do i escape the spaces here?
When you query HubDB, you'll need to use the column name (not the label) in your query. Spaces are not available in column names. When you create a column, spaces will be replaced with `_`
hey James, thanks for the reply. Actually the column name is Track and the value is "Data Pipelines & Systems" so it's the value that contain spaces and i need to escape those spaces
let me know if that makes sense?
